programme.title: One Pill Can Kill
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Told through the voices of grieving parents, this documentary follows the real and lasting impact of the fentanyl crisis. Capturing the aftermath of sudden loss, the search for answers, and the transformation of grief into public advocacy.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Vanishing of a Promising Wisconsin Teen
programme.desc: In 1990, an 18-year-old driving across Wisconsin to a job conference never arrives. After her van and later her body are discovered, the mystery surrounding Berit Beck’s death persists for more than two decades. What happened in that van?

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Young Mom of Three a Nature Newbie
programme.desc: Ashley, 28, has spent 14 years raising her three children. Kinga comes to Manchester to get Ashley out into nature for the first time so she can share these experiences and pass them along to her children.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Is This a Pork Chop?
programme.desc: Chef Yesinia Melo of Jessy’s Clean Meals in Lawrence takes on Chef Jason Gentles of Sahel in Lowell in a spicy battle of the mill towns. Can Yesinia’s fresh cooking put the Jerk champion in his place? Or will Jason knock it out of the park?

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Fundraising Scams
programme.desc: Crimes exploiting online generosity are a growing trend. These real-life stories show people going to great lengths to con unsuspecting donors out of their money.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Iowa Athletes Embody Midwestern Grit
programme.desc: Whether it's a wrestling star training through grief, champion rollerskaters challenged on the world stage, or a cycling team pushing through obstacles, Iowans don't back down when the going gets tough.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Florida Fugitive
programme.desc: Weeks after a pregnant woman is shot and killed in Orlando, a shootout between her suspected killer and a police officer sparks a manhunt.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Interesting People
programme.desc: From inventors to marathon runners, interesting people are all over the country.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Best of Both Worlds in New Castle & Youngstown
programme.desc: Go climbing, sample sizzling hot dogs and cold beer, throw a few axes and explore the rich history on the border of PA & Ohio.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Superfan With Cerebral Palsy Surprised With Magical Night
programme.desc: Darlene, a young superfan with cerebral palsy, becomes Justin's date for one magical night after the team hears her story and learns how much she loves the show.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Local Love: Ready To Settle Down
programme.desc: Luke is a Kansas City bachelor who is finally ready to settle down. He’s purging the dating apps and hoping to find the perfect match. He’ll meet three blind dates as they play pickleball, get their shuffleboard on and visit a llama farm.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Settling Down But Never Settling
programme.desc: Jessie Fiacco is a single mother and nurse, who during the pandemic made home visits. But Jessie hasn’t made time for herself. Luckily for her, Kinga is in town to show Jessie she doesn’t have to travel far to get far out.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: The Competing Couple
programme.desc: A show first! A woman and her boyfriend each try their hand at Frank Nicotero's trivia questions to see who can win the most money.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque: Foraging for Flavor
programme.desc: With award-winning Chef Marie Yniguez, Amanda forages for wild ingredients along the Rio Grande, makes paletas—Mexican popsicles— from scratch, and enters a high pressure cooking competition.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Sweet Treats to Tickle Your Taste Buds from the Midwest
programme.desc: Sink your teeth into the Midwest's sweets. From the messy madness of puppy chow to kolaches to the infamous buckeye, enjoy the delicious confections that make the region a haven for dessert lovers.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Kind-Hearted 10-year-old Gets Showered With Thanks
programme.desc: Catalina, a 10-year-old community hero with a heart of gold spends her days giving back. Today, Meaghan surprises Catalina with a day of her own, from Sea adventures to a new set of wheels and more. It's her time to shine.

programme.title: The Spark
programme.sub-title: The Spark: Hockey Warrior
programme.desc: "Kaleigh Fratkin, defenseman for the Boston Pride, is on a mission to improve the sport for the women who follow her. She shares her love for the game and the secrets of her success. - "

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: White-Collar Crimes
programme.desc: These criminals may not have blood on their hands, but they still leave despair in their wake. From shady non-profits to fraudulent contractors, to wide-spread postal theft, here are some of the most devastating white-collar crimes to be attempted across the country.

programme.title: WGAL Local News
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Get the latest local news and weather from WGAL.

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Power of One
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: News 8 is following the journey of a young York County woman with a stage 4 terminal cancer diagnosis as part of our series, "Power of One".

programme.title: Silver Linings
programme.sub-title: Silver Linings: Not Your Grandmother's Retirement
programme.desc: Welcome to Lancaster, PA, one of the country's hottest retirement hubs. Here, seniors, from a beauty pageant queen to a 90 year-old swim champion aren’t slowing down; they’re rewriting the playbook and redefining aging in America.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.

programme.title: Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WGAL News 8's Anne Shannon for "Behind the Lens: A Storytellers Project," where we relive the best of 2024 through the eyes of our award-winning photojournalists.

programme.title: FIXT
programme.sub-title: FIXT: Truck Driver Aims To Live Longer With New Lease On Bite
programme.desc: Ted wants to live to 100 with his beloved wife beside him. But his oral health threatens his future. Kristy’s a FIXT staffer desperate to smile big on her wedding day. Will love help them face their fears?

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Makers, crafters and artists square off to create the most iconic art piece that best represents their city. From glass-blowers and chalk artists to metalsmiths and tattooers, see who Host Ashley Adams and the judges will crown the victor.

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Maker Nation

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.sub-title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: The Middle Child
programme.sub-title: News 9 True Crime: The Middle Child
programme.desc: (2022) In the 1980s, a serial killer buried a woman and three girls in the woods of New Hampshire. One of those girls is still unidentified. WMUR joins the investigators who promise they won’t give up until her name is restored.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: A Mother's Nightmare: The Desperate Search for Cupcake
programme.desc: Three-year-old Kamille McKinney, affectionately known as "Cupcake," is abducted while playing outside a relative's Birmingham home. The ensuing search unifies the city, as residents pray she will be found alive.

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In “Free Spirit,” award-winning bartender and host Kate Gerwin takes to the road and meets people in their workplaces and their favorite watering holes.
